sentences.en: A councillor should have the collective interest of society at heart.
sentences.cn: 议员应当关心大众的利益.

sentences.en: Are present , councillor Smith ( vice councillor Brown ).
sentences.cn: 曾出席或 到场 的有:地方议会议员史密斯和他的替代人地方议会议员布朗.

sentences.en: Councillor Jones made his point well and the committee accepted his proposal.
sentences.cn: 琼斯政务员用自己的观点说服了大家,委员会同意了他的建议.

sentences.en: Councillor Paul Tisley will be in attendance at the start of the meeting to welcome us.
sentences.cn: 议员保罗·提斯里将在会议开始时出席，以欢迎我们。

sentences.en: For seven years until 1991 he served as a district councillor in Solihull.
sentences.cn: 直到1991年他连续7年在索利霍尔担任区议员。

sentences.en: If you don't get any joy, get in touch with your local councillor.
sentences.cn: 如果你没得到任何结果，请和本地议员联系。

sentences.en: In the eyes of the servants, Councillor Zhang is an amiable person.
sentences.cn: 在下人们的眼中, 张员外是个和善的人.

sentences.en: She questioned his integrity as a councillor.
sentences.cn: 她质疑他作为市议员的诚信度.

sentences.en: Take a seat please, Councillor Jones will see you in a moment.
sentences.cn: 请稍坐, 琼斯政务委员即刻就见你.

sentences.en: Talk to your local councillor about the problem.
sentences.cn: 关于这个问题可与你那里的政务委员谈一谈。

sentences.en: The Prime Minister called Councillor Marshall "a crank"
sentences.cn: 首相称马歇尔议员为“怪人”。

sentences.en: There the councillor was finally voted down by her own council!
sentences.cn: 这个议员最终被她自己的议会投票否决!

sentences.en: What do you think Councillor Evans?
sentences.cn: 埃文斯议员,你意见如何?

sentences.en: Who is your city councillor, alderperson, reeve or regional councillor?
sentences.cn: 你所在城市或地区的市议员或地区议员是谁?

sentences.en: Wilson smiled thinly. "We have decided to name the new Home after Councillor Minford."
sentences.cn: 威尔逊淡淡一笑，“我们已经决定以市政议员明福德的名字给这个新疗养院命名。”

sentences.en: Write to your local councillor to complain.
sentences.cn: 写信给你们当地的市政议员投诉。

words.tran_cn: 委员会；会议；理事会；地方议会；顾问班子
法律顾问；忠告；商议；讨论；决策
顾问；参赞；辅导员（等于counselor）；律师；法律顾问
顾问；法律顾问；参事（等于counsellor）

trans.tran_cn: 市议员，政务委员会委员
